did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle: Virginia Congress on Hunger 1988 Report Collection, 1985-1988
did.abstract: This collection contains the final and draft versions of a 1988 report from the Virginia Congress on Hunger detailing the extent of hunger and poverty in the Commonwealth of Virginia, a news release about the report, and the 1985 report about hunger and poverty.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Virginia Congress on Hunger 1988 Report Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Virginia Congress on Hunger 1988 Report Collection, Ms2015-050, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Virginia Congress on Hunger 1988 Report Collection was donated to Special Collection in 2014.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Virginia Congress on Hunger 1988 Report Collection was completed in September 2015.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the final and draft versions of a report from the Virginia Congress on Hunger discussing hunger and poverty in the Commonwealth of Virginia, entitled Hunger and Poverty In Virginia: Revisiting the 1985 Report of the Joint Subcommittee Studying Hunger and Malnutrition in the Commonwealth. The report was submitted to the Governor and the General Assembly of Virginia and revisits findings in a previous report by the Virginia Congress on Hunger made in 1985. In addition to the report on hunger, the collection contains a press release from the Virginia Congress announcing the report. Lastly, the collection includes a copy of the 1985 Virginia Congress on Hunger report to the governor and General Assembly of Virginia.
